backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing Internet Identity–based access control, user profiles, and per-user game progress for three levels, with authorization checks on all public methods.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all major frontend source files, hooks, components, styles, and documentation for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining the Chinese New Year red/gold theme with light and dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads the Vite-powered TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README.md: Comprehensive developer documentation describing the game concept, frontend/backend architecture, gameplay features, data flow, and local development setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, profile setup, and screen-based navigation across all game pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Reusable button component handling Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog forcing first-time authenticated users to enter and save a display name before accessing the game.
frontend/src/components/game/FoundFeedba: Temporary animated visual overlay shown at click coordinates when a hidden object is successfully found.
frontend/src/components/layout/CnyLayout: Defines a themed page layout with CNY styling, including a header, main content slot, and footer with credits and icons.
frontend/src/game/HiddenObjectScene.tsx: Implements the core hidden-object gameplay scene, tracking found objects, progress, and click feedback while rendering interactive targets over a background image.
frontend/src/game/levels.ts: Exports static level definitions describing titles, targets, background images, and object placements for each hidden-object level.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Declares TypeScript interfaces for level definitions and target placement metadata used by the game.
frontend/src/game/useSoundEffects.ts: Provides a React hook to manage mute state and play a simple Web Audio sound effect when an object is found.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, handling authentication, access control initialization, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and save the current caller’s user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, managing login state, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for reading and mutating user game progress, such as marking levels completed or resetting progress.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables (including CNY colors), dark mode overrides, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wiring up React Query and Internet Identity providers and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Authentication landing page that shows game intro, features, and a login/logout button, greeting authenticated users by name using Internet Identity and profile hooks.
frontend/src/pages/GameCompletePage.tsx: End-of-game screen displayed after all levels are completed, showing achievements and allowing navigation back to level select or resetting user progress.
frontend/src/pages/GameplayPage.tsx: Main gameplay page that renders a hidden object scene for a selected level, tracks found objects, plays sound effects, and marks levels complete when targets are found.
frontend/src/pages/LevelCompletePage.tsx: Intermediate completion screen shown after finishing a level, displaying results and offering navigation to the next level or back to level selection.
frontend/src/pages/LevelSelectPage.tsx: Level selection dashboard that displays available levels, completion status from user progress, user greeting, and routes to gameplay or game completion when all levels are done.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom Chinese New Year colors, animations, container settings, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the overall project state and scope for a full-stack 2D Chinese New Year themed hidden-object game, including schema/version metadata and a high-level project summary. Lists implemented features such as Internet Identity authentication, frontend screens, gameplay logic for three levels, progress persistence, React Query caching, and data-driven level configuration.
